officialTitle: Evaluation of the Influence of Tramadol Injection Simultaneous With Sciatic Nerve Block on the Duration of Efficient Sensory Blockade in Patients Operated on for Calcaneus Fracture
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients with foot fracture scheduled for surgical repair in spinal anesthesia
* Informed consent
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* No consent
* Spinal anesthesia or sciatic nerve block contraindicated
* Known intolerance to tramadol or other contraindications for the drug
